Name: Sanguis Khan
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with the Boiling Breath and Hellfire.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: If this model dashes, then after this model has moved, each enemy Formation this model moved across takes D3 ethereal damage.
While an enemy model is within 6" of this model, that model’s Formation may not attempt to declare a charge.
When this model completes a charge, this model’s melee weapons gain the Decimating Ability until the end of the Step.
